titleStmt.title: The Resolution of Prince Charles, being generall of His Maiesties forces in the north who intendeth to shew his heroick spirit and filiall duty for the preservation of his royall father, and the encouragement of all loyall subjects of the kingdome of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: ... Printed for H. W. and H. T.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
